headline.main: SHIP SINKING HELD NO CAUSE FOR WAR; 50% Oppose Our Entry Even if Nazis Destroy a U.S. Craft, Gallup Survey Finds

lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N.J., May 1 -- A question uppermost in the minds of many Americans today is what will happen if an American warship is sunk by German submarines in the course of patrolling the neutrality zone or possibly in the course of convoying ships to Britain. Would this make the country want to get into a "shooting" war with Germany?
abstract: Gallup polls show; 50 to 58% oppose war entry if U S ships are sunk
snippet: PRINCETON, N.J., May 1 -- A question uppermost in the minds of many Americans today is what will happen if an American warship is sunk by German submarines in the course of patrolling the neutrality zone or possibly in the course of convoying ship...

byline.original: By GEORGE GALLUP Director, American Institute of Public Opinion
